Half-Life has to be one of the best first-person shooters I have ever played for multiple reasons. The story, much like its successor, is full of memorable and likable characters, creatively designed monsters, and is overall a well written plot. The graphics have aged extremely well and is second only to Unreal 1 in terms of best-looking 1998 shooters. It is also very challenging, even on the easy difficulty, as you need to economize weapons and supplies and perform tricky platforming. The soundtrack of the game is superb and the controls are extremely accurate. 

Final Verdict: While Half-Life 2 is an amazing game, DO NOT skip this game. It is truly a classic and worth the money.

10/10

Dieses Spiel habe ich mir geladen, da ich zur Veröffentlichung damals ein Riesenfan davon war. Ich hätte allerdings nicht gedacht, dass es mir heute noch so viel Spaß machen würde diese Viecher abzuschießen. ;) Also es ist definitiv immer noch ein sehr lustiges Spiel für zwischendurch.

Allerdings ist negativ, dass die Steuerung wirklich sehr stark überreagiert. Es lässt sich oftmals nicht wirklich vermeiden rechts oder links daneben zu springen. 

Alles in Allem kann ich aber darüber hinwegsehen und freue mich drauf ein paar Stunden ab und an in Nostalgie zu schwelgen.

A classic game that defined a genre we love today. If you haven't played this yet what are you waiting for?
Игра - легенда.

Rating: 8/10
Overview First Person Shooter


The Good:

+ 80% of the game has some fantastic level design, in fact it has some of the best level design in any FPS  
game, everything just feels right.

+ The pacing in the game is near flawless, the game never relies on the same gimmick twice, and every chapter is designed  around a certain concept to keep things interesting. The game offers a great mix of puzzle solving and action.

+ The game has a variety of different weapons to fit the situation at hand as well as your playstyle

+ For an old game the AI is surprisingly pretty good, granted it does get stupid sometimes but that is forgivable

+ I love the sound effects in the game. To me the music and sound effects are a big part of the Half Life experience.

The Bad:

-20% of the level design is bad, sometimes its hard to figure out where to go and some of it just doesn't make a whole lot  
of sense. 

-the last few chapters of the game are awful.

- I experienced numerous glitches in the game

Conclusions

Half LIfe is the father of modern FPS. Back when it was released I would have given it a 9/10 but the game for all its  
strengths is starting to show its age. However given its age it still holds up better than most games and being a FPS that  
means something. This game really should be experienced by everyone to see how modern FPS games came to be.

Кто не знает кто такой Гордон Фримен? Или что такое Блэк Меса? Или то что фомка не только орудие труда, но и грозное оружие?
Если кто то незнаком с этой классикой, он просто обязан с ней познакомиться... хотя бы для того, чтобы понимать про кого разговаривают его друзья, выхода продолжения какой игры ждёт его отец, и благодаря какой игре появилась твоя любимая КС.
Да и вообще, мало какой современный шутер подарит это: отсутствие регена жизни, скрытые места с "бонусами", врагов которые не раз заставят выматериться в рукав.

Dovrebbe essere inutile consigliare questo gioco: ogni videogiocatore che si rispetti dovrebbe averci giocato ed essere allo stesso tempo ben cosciente di tutta la storia che si porta dietro. Ancora ora rigiocare a questa perla riporta emozioni forti, un gameplay che non stanca mai e una storia che per quanto tamarra riesce ancora ad affascinare... chi parla di grafica stia zitto, questi sono prodotti che vanno presi proprio per come sono usciti e pensati nella loro epoca.
Consigliatissima anche la mod Black Mesa.... quei ragazzi hanno fatto un lavoro strabiliante!

The classic that started it all(and all the waiting).  It's a long game at around 15 hours on medium difficulty on my first playthrouhg(on Steam).  Half Life isn't like most other FPS's since it includes almost as much platforming as shooting(making it similar to the Metroid Prime series with more gunplay).  If you haven't played it yet you're missing a classic.

The original game that started VALVe's reputation. A great game,with exciting monsters and silly AI. You can even find a multiplayer server,but they're usually low amount of people on them. Either way,the one that started them all. If you have never tried Half-Life. Get it. NOW!
Good luck with the story! ;)

This is such a fun game even though it came out in 1998. But it does have its fair share of pros and cons.

The main thing i loved about this game is the amont of variety in it, at one point you'll be fighting three gaint claws then hinding from a helicopter in a mine field, then fighting a huge fish underwater with a crossbow. You'll be faced with something new every time, which is somthing most games need to stay fun. Another great thing was the amount of different wepons you keep finding thoughout the entire game, so by the end you have somthing like 20 different wepons (with most of then having a right click secondary fire).

The graphics in the game were terrible (but it was made in 1998 so thats ok). The level design was ok (but sometimes you crouch lower then you thought was posible). There is no sprint, only nomal, walk and crouch. The AI sucked, because they somtimes have too fast or too slow reactions, it's really hard to sneak up on them, they occasionly shoot at you before they've finished turning to face you, and some enemys kill you instantly (but your speed make up for most of these problems with the AI). I couldn't understand the plot most of the time (because there is no cut scenes) and the ending was a bit disappointing, it was slightly to sudden.

Most of these problems were because it came out in 1998.
Which doesn't matter because i loved the game
7.5/10
Its ok.

Wow!
Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass solch ein altes Spiel solch einen Spaß bereiten könne.
Das Spiel fesselt einen ab der 1. Minute.
Das Gameplay ist flüssig, die KI der Gegner ist ziemlich gut und die Grafik war damals hervorragend.
Dennoch treten ab und zu mal kleine Fehler auf, die aber den Spielspaß nicht erheblich beeinflussen.
Ich kann den Hype der späten 90-er Jahre vollkommen nachvollziehen und ich empfehle wirklich allen Shooter-Fans, die viel Wert auf Story und herausforderndes Gameplay legen, in diese Faszination einzutauchen und sich restlos mitziehen zu lassen.

Half life NON è un gioco è un film - giocatelo con cuffie e al buio, gli anni che ha non li sente e per uno steamer aver giocato a half life è come non aver presso il biberon da piccolo! 
Il gioco è stato sviluppato dalla Valve con un motore pesantemente modificato di Quake.Pubblicato dalla Sierra on line nel 1998 , fu subito scalpore, per le sue tante virtù.
Il gioco narra del dott Gordon Freeman che tenta di scappare dal complesso immaginario di Black Mesa nel New Messico.Gordon scappando si troverà a combattere più forze sia aliene che umane.
Il primo capitolo per quei tempi e TUTT'ORA ha una grafica che non risente degli anni che ha.Ritengo che diverta tutt'ora se qualche sperduta anima non l'abbia ancora giocato.Ritengo anche che sia un must-have e must-play per tutti gli amanti dei giochi Valve che sono molto giocati per qualità e comparto grafico.
Quindi il mio consiglio è di acquistare ai saldi l'Orange BOX e giocarci. La versione Source è un po' meglio perchè rivisitata con il source, ma avrete la stessa grande storia raccontata da VALVE.

Very good game, although it has older graphics i would definitly recommend playing this because valve does a great job of interweaving its games that could go on for some time. loved searching for the G-MAN in some of the stages and i really feel like i know this universe well. not much replayability but the novelty sure hasn't worn off. If you like first person shooter puzzle games like portal (the sister games to half life) i would definitly recommend picking this up because if you are paying attension there are several pionts in which the characters in all of the half life games cross paths

Valveの名作FPS。有志日本語化可能。
『DOOM』でFPSの基本が確立され、『Half-Life』でストーリー性の高い
アドベンチャーFPSの基本が確立されたと言われているゲーム。

今となっては、さすがにグラフィックが古いものの、
謎解きとアクション要素がうまく噛み合っており、最後まで飽きさせない。
さすがに名作だけあって完成度の高さは素晴らしい。

ホラーSFな展開で、広大なマップを探索しながら進んでいく。
クリーチャーも個性的なものが多く、飽きさせない作りとなっている。
難を言えば、主人公の動作が非常に速いため、FPS酔いになり易い。
また、基本的にADS（エイムモード）がないため、最近のFPSに慣れている人には
違和感があるかもしれない。

ちょっとしたED分岐もあり、その後の展開も気になるところ。

同じ時間軸を描いた番外編として、『Half-Life: Opposing Force』、
『Half-Life: Blue Shift』がある。
こちらは英語のみではあるが、なかなかにボリュームもあるのでプレイをお勧め。
エフェクトなど、一部リマスターされた『Half-Life: Source』もリリースされている。

OFFにしてプレイ推奨。

[h1]Игровой процесс[/h1]
Конечно, самое захватывающее в игре — [u]это ее неповторимая атмосфера[/u],[i]складывающаяся из всех остальных факторов. Сколько раз Вам придется наблюдать сцены из жизни кровожадных алиенов, сопровождающиеся обильным выбрасыванием останков невинно убиенного и характерными, дробяще-рвущими звуками, без особой возможности чем-нибудь помочь несчастному, находящемуся, к примеру, по ту сторону непробиваемого стекла. Обстановка полной неопределенности того, что может произойти с Вами в следующую минуту за ближайшим же поворотом производит сильное психологическое воздействие, а потому под конец прохождения этого OEM-демо, вы будете автоматически передвигаться в стиле "а-ля коммандос", прячась за всем что есть на уровне и одним глазком заглядывая за угол перед тем, как выйти из-за поворота. Возможно, и по своей квартире тоже.[/i]

Игра, которую невозможно забыть. В который раз проходишь, но она не надоедает.

Es necesario jugar a este juego para seguir la trama de Half Life desde el principio. El movimiento es difícil y puede llevarte a más de algun error durante el juego debido a la velocidad de Freeman. Mucha variedad de armas que te fuerzan a distintas formas de combate con distintos entornos donde debes preparar bien como resolver las situaciones para que no te superen los enemigos, porque en este juego sí pueden hacerlo. La dificultad en general resulta alta para una primera partida. La trama está bien llevada y el juego nos trata como al personaje. Hay acción, puzzles y momentos de pausa donde nos son reveladas partes de la trama y en general con un buen ritmo narrativo y integrando bastante bien trama/interactividad.

Lo recomiendo para comprobar el nivel del partió Valve en una de las mejores sagas de videojuegos con una secuela increible que mejoró esta primera, aunque sin esa segunda parte lo seguiría recomendando. Sé Gordon Freeman
ein echter klassiker

Um ótimo jogo em sua época, capaz de divertir um grupo de fans até hoje, principalmente por ser base de muitos mods gratuitos. Vale a pena pra quem é fan. Eu pessoalmente nunca joguei muito, mas sei como esse jogo é Phoda. Seu single player é muito bom também, e já vale o jogo inteiro.

The game holds up pretty well considering it came out years ago.  The sound effects and graphics are definitely dated, though.  The story itself didn't do too much for me, but it wasn't boring.  I never finished the game, however, as the last boss is a bit of a pain.

This game is amazing, and truly "One of the best PC games ever" according to that review for the Half Life DVD Cover.
The gameplay and graphics are outstanding, with puzzles as well as Shoot-Em-Up. The storyline was good too, and made sense, but the rather Cliched introduction of the Player starting the mess. The bots and CPU in this game are pretty good, and they interact with each other which I don't think no other game has matched (In the 90's of course.) I give this a 10/10, for it's superior gameplay.

Un clásico! A pesar del paso de los años mantiene el mismo interés que en su momento. Divertido, ágil, variado, ... Partidas multijugador frenéticas, tensas y divertidísimas. También a destacar todos los mapas y personajes añadidos por los fans, que alargan la diversión del original.

[h1]"Don´t let the age talks, that's a sin in videogames"[h1]

This is not a game, this is [b]the game[/b] that started everything, the page where you're reading this wouldn't exist, masterpieces like Portal and Left4Dead2 wouldn't exist and some modern concepts from FPS and Sci-Fi in videogames wouldn't exist if this videogame wasn't that good enough. This game marked a whole age, it marked a before and an after in videogames. It's just one of the big ones.

Это худшая старая игра,которую я только видел. Как такое дерьмо можно называть классикой? Классика это: doom,fallout, quake и duke nukem. А это не классика, это одна большая кишка по который ты ходишь. Самая скучная и не интресная игра,ходишь по однообразным уровням,стреляешь в тупых врагов. Пули летят вообще не пойми куда, и сюжет тоже нудный. Если вы купите эту игру впервые, вы просто зря потратите деньги и время.
